mapper.select: select u.id, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.sex, u.status, u.create_time, u.update_time from userPO u left join user_position up on u.id = up.user_id right join positionPO p on up.position_id = p.id where up.position_id = #{positionId}
select p.id, p.name, p.code, p.create_time, p.update_time from positionPO p left join user_position up on p.id = up.position_id right join userPO u on up.user_id = u.id where up.user_id = #{userId}
